TopicTitle: I made a Tumblr blog about cool space stuff! Come follow!

Articles.Content:
I've decided to branch out a bit with social media, and have made a Tumblr blog to share cool things I stumble across. Come and follow, and I can follow you back if you'd like, and submit stuff I can put on my blog too! ^.^

https://www.tumblr.com/blog/maximus-97
I try to avoid Tumblr, something about it bothers me...

I try to avoid Tumblr, something about it bothers me...

What might that be?
I see only a Loginscreen? Do you need an account to see something on this tumblr stuff?

What might that be?

The self-righteous attitude most of its users possess.

I see only a Loginscreen? Do you need an account to see something on this tumblr stuff?

Yeah that's really annoying. What if I don't want to make an account? Ever considered that?

Yeah that's really annoying. What if I don't want to make an account? Ever considered that?

Err... I've logged out of tumblr and went to a .tumblr page enough time to know you don't need to log in to see things.

The self-righteous attitude most of its users possess.

Very true, but only in certain parts of tumblr, stay away from that and it's great.

The self-righteous attitude most of its users possess.

I managed to get the majority of the populace to hate me because I pointed out that them pointing out the racism in everything wasn't even relevant to the post in the first place and the original poster didn't even have a malicious intention of racism, and then I got a bunch of hate because people somehow thought I said that racism is only racism if a white person said it. Still do not understand how they came to that conclusion.

Eh, getting a whole social network to hate me was a major point on my bucket list, glad I got it over with.
